data.name: Kharon's Crypt - Even Death May Die Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Crypt awaits you


The Official Soundtrack for Kharon's Crypt - Even Death May Die will bring you back to your childhood when you spent all your afternoons playing your old console.

The Kharon's Crypt - Even Death May Die Official Soundtrack is composed by Tony Manfredonia.
